oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Diamond physical and chemical characteristics database
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Stachel, Thomas
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A database of physical and IR-spectroscopic characteristics (including nitrogen content and aggregation state) and stable isotopic compositions (d13C and d15N) of principally inclusion-bearing diamonds
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Earth and Environmental Sciences
diamond
nitrogen content and aggregation
carbon isotopes
nitrogen isotopes
